Headline: #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express and Temporary Reroute at Ashland/27th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland & X9 Ashland Express buses are rerouted via Ashland, Service Orange Line, Archer, Loomis, Cermak & Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Service Orange Line, Archer, Loomis, Cermak & Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/27th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central Park/16th
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park: due to, street blockage near Central Park/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park: due to, street blockage near Central Park/16th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Austin.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Austin. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
